resources.string: Think you know your geography? Let\'s test that out! Click the Take Quiz button to get started and answer 6 simple questions to see what you know!

How to use

Welcome, we are so excited for you o test your geographic knowledge, but first we need to how to use the app. Each quiz includes the date and score once completed. Open the navigation drawer to view the navigation menu. Here, you will be able to invoke the app\'s functions. You will be able to access the following screens:

Take Quiz
Here, you will be able to take a 6 questions quiz to test yourself on country to continent knowledge. You can take as many quizzes as you woulld like, and after the completion of each quiz, you will be presented with your score, along with the date you completed the quiz.

Review Quizzes
Here, you will be able to review all (completed) past quizzes. You will be presented with all of your previously taken quizzes with information such as the date the quiz was completed and the score you made on each particular quiz, with the most recent quizzes on the top of the list. Get help
Useful help information about the app will be displayed.

Close app
The will close the app.
